title: Russian fonts
content: I am designing my corporate stationery and want to integrate my address in Russian. In this case I am looking for the highest possible font. My thinking is, “you never get a second chance to make a first impression”
author: priyatel

comments.content: You can see preview and choose&purchase professional quality cyrillic fonts from [http://www.paratype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060526005755/http:/www.paratype.com/)
